thread.title: Woods says recovery will be 'long and tedious'
thread.title_full: Woods says recovery will be 'long and tedious'

title: Woods says recovery will be 'long and tedious'
text: > Top News Woods says recovery will be 'long and tedious' Tiger Woods, right, talks with Lisandro Borges, CEO of Americaâ€™s Golf Gup, during a press conference to launch the Bridgestone America's Golf Cup in Mexico City, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015. Woods withdrew from the Bridgestone America's Golf Cup and two other events he had planned to play this year following back surgery. He isn't expected to return to the tour until January at the earliest. (AP Photo/Rebecca Blackwell)
